pages.text: Product of Necromantic magic, it attracts the attention of otherwise passive undead creatures. When placed in the world, right-click on it with a $(l:artifacts/misc/necromantic_stone)Necromantic Stone$(/l) to activate it. Using the Necromantic Stone on it a second time will deactivate it.

pages.title: Effects
pages.text: On activation, its face will light up, and all $(item)undead$() in a wide area will be drawn towards it, provided that there is nothing more interesting, such as a nearby player.
